sections.title: Our Values
sections.subtitle: At Software for Love, we foster a culture that promotes learning, collaboration, sustainability, and philanthrophy. We always put our best foot forward and love taking on new challenges. We strive to use our knowledge and abilities to help our partners solve problems within our community.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Got a project request? Please fill out this form with a brief description of your project. We will contact you and schedule a meeting as soon as possible.

sections.title: Work with us
sections.subtitle: Want to work with us? Check out our organizations and volunteers page for more info.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Got a question, need help with a problem, or just want to leave feedback? Leave us your contact info and we will get back to you.

sections.title: Meet The Team
sections.subtitle: Meet a dedicated group of young individuals who yearn to spread positivity and love through software. We encourage our team to be proud of their creativity, be optimistic and open-minded about technology while giving back to the community through Software for Love.

Code Blocks

Blocks of code are either fenced by lines with three back-ticks, or are indented with four spaces.

let sequence = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13];
for (let i = 0; i < sequence.length; i++) {
  console.log(sequence[i]);
}

Inline Elements

sections.title: Our Values
sections.subtitle: At Software for Love, we foster a culture that promotes learning, collaboration, sustainability, and philanthrophy. We always put our best foot forward and love taking on new challenges. We strive to use our knowledge and abilities to help our partners solve problems within our community.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Got a project request? Please fill out this form with a brief description of your project. We will contact you and schedule a meeting as soon as possible.

sections.title: You have successfully submitted your contact information.
sections.subtitle: We will get back to you shortly as soon as we can.

sections.title: Volunteers
sections.subtitle: Volunteers are an essential part of Software For Love! We encourage our team to be unique and proud of their creativity. We provide a platform that allows our volunteers to demonstrate their skills and abilities while giving back to our community. Apply today to join our growing team!

sections.title: Apply Now
sections.subtitle: Are you interested in joining our team? Fill in the contact form below, and we will reach out to you as soon as possible.

sections.title: Software for Love
sections.subtitle: Software For Love is a non-profit organization that focuses on providing software solutions. We are a team of young professionals who are passionate about technology and seek to give back to our community.

features.title: What We Do
features.content: Our team is dedicated to providing a variety of services such as web development, UI/UX design, data analytics, and database management. We seek to develop software for clients in return for a charitable contribution, or a charitable service provided by an organization.

features.title: Join The Team
features.content: Our platform encourages students to showcase their skills and abilities, while also providing back to the community. We actively recruit new talent for marketing, finance, engineering, and more.
